text: hello my name is kafayi I am a senior

am going to talk about the Amazon guard
Duty functionality that allows customers

up and administer protection plan

an AWS
organization Amazon guard DT is a threat
detection service that continuously
monitors your AWS accounts and workloads
for malicious activity and delivers
detailed security findings for
visibility and
Remediation guide Duty can identify
unusual or unauthorized activity like
cryptocurrency mining access from
unusual locations to data stored in
Amazon simple storage service Amazon S3
or on authorized access to Amazon
elastic kubernetes service Amazon eeks
clusters
guard Duty malware protection adds file
scanning to detect the presence of
malware for work close utilizing Amazon
elastic Block store Amazon EBS
volumes
GS runtime monitoring extends the
ability to do runtime thread detection
for Amazon eks Nos and containers by
monitoring system data Telemetry such as
file access process EX execution and
network
connections customers have the ability
to enable any of those guard Dy
protection plans within their
accounts AWS recommends using a
delegated administrator account to
aggregate findings from security
services such as Amazon guard Duty
security Hub and other AWS Security
Services to make it easier for security
Personnel to configure and view findings
across their
accounts this
recommendation along with other security
best practices can be found in the
security reference architecture under
AWS prescriptive guidance now let's look
at how we can enable guard duty to use a
